general.headline: General Manager, Warehousing & 3PL Division at Kings Transport and Logistics
general.description:
ABOUT KINGS
Kings is an Australian owned and operated company established in 1991 offering integrated supply chain solutions across Australia and New Zealand. Today, Kings now employ more than 800 staff, engages over 1300 subcontracted drivers and more importantly, offers a diverse range of career opportunities across Australia and New Zealand.
VISION & VALUES
Our vision is to champion and foster strong partnerships as a team and with our customers by understanding how to best leverage our services to support and in turn reflect their brand. We believe in being - COLLABORATIVE, PROGRESSIVE, TRUSTWORTHY, UNITED
COMMUNITY SPONSORSHIP
Our team are united in the approach we take to supporting the communities we belong to, taking part in many diverse initiatives from Charity Knitting bees to recent (cold) CEO sleep-out to raise money and awareness for Homelessness.
ENVIRONMENTAL SUSTAINABILITY
We are dedicated to being environmentally responsible industry leaders. We are particularly proud of our recent collaboration with SEA on the Electric Vehicles, and of our history with GreenFleet - taking part in activities such as tree-planting to offset the environmental impact of our fleet

SERVICES
Kings is Australasia’s premier Metropolitan Transport & Logistics provider. We specialise in providing urgent, on-demand local courier and taxi truck services with a team of logistic experts for customised permanent fleet solutions. 
DOCUMENT & PARCEL SERVICES
COURIER & TAXI TRUCK SERVICES
DEDICATED FLEET PLACEMENT
HOME DELIVERY SERVICES
3RD PARTY LOGISTICS

CAPABILITIES
Kings has a long standing presence in the Transport & Logistics market, employing industry experts to manage our vast network of vehicles and equipment, skilled operators and integrated value added solutions for safety, technology and customer service.

jobs.jobTitle: Kings Warehousing - Major Project and Client Implementation Manager
jobs.description:
Part of the Kings Transport and Logistics Group with turnover exceeding $175m p.a. covering all Domestic Australian States plus internationally based in Auckland NZ.

Kings Warehousing and 3PL Division is a National Warehouse and 3rd Party Logistics Provider servicing many high profile Retail (Apparel & Footwear; FMCG; Pharmaceutical/Health & Beauty brands; Goverment/Service; Outdoor/Gardening; Print/Marketing categories) and Non Retail/Service oriented clients covering both B2C/B2B and direct e-Commence.
Currently have 5 major warehouses accross Victoria (and minor warehouses / hardstand locations in other states attached to the state transport divisons).

Key role is managing:-
All new major projects within the warehouse business including new client implementations from end to end including specifically:
WMS upgrade accross all warehouses from Radio Beacon to Accellos (v6.3); 
Commissioning new warehouse facilities; 
Contineous improvement projects with current clients including relay/product slotting to "picks", taking in weight and cube and replenishment profiles of SKUs.

Managed all Key Client Accounts for Kings Warehousing ranging from $5M to $200K
      p.a. Clients.
      

    Grew sales in both current and assisted new client growth within the warehousing
      
      business.

general.headline: Managing Director at Silk Contract Logistics
general.description:
A successful CEO / General Manager  who  has delivered outstanding results in business development and start up environments. 
More recent experience has focused on turnaround situations of complex and distressed assets, with the role of managing the contract logistics business at Silk Group among my more challenging.
A new chapter now awaits as having succesfuly led an MBO of the business, the personal investment is not just time and energy it is now financial as well.

jobs.description:
Following the recent management buy out of Silk Contract Logistics from Silk
      Logistictics Group (Gresham) I have assumed the role of Managing Director, Silk
      Contract Logistics.
      

    Myself and three other key managers have taken signifcant shareholding in the
      business and along with Gandel Invest as a key shareholder the future of the business
      is assured.
      

    
      Exciting times ahead!

As part of the Silk Logistics Group, the role was to drive growth into the contract logistics business. The Group had taken on significant warehouse capacity which was negatively impacting shareholder returns.
Despite difficult trading conditions and capital constraints the business achieved 40% revenue growth in the two years under my leadership.

jobs.jobTitle: General Manager Distribution Courier and Logistics Services
jobs.description:
Profit and Loss accountability for Australia Post's Distribution businesses including Post
      Logistics, Messenger Post and Sai Cheng. Key focus on establishing strategy, business
      
      model design and execution of same to meet required growth and profit targets.

Commenced with Toll following the acquisition of Ausdoc in 2002. Primary focus was to establish a cross town and same day courier capability within Toll. From a small base revenue of $30m on commencement, the business was turning over in excess of $100m when I resigned to pursue other opportunities at Australia Post. Achievements included launch of Toll Fast brand, rollout of new IT platform and business model that was fully automated end to end and the succesful acquisition and integration of Mayne Nickless Express business.

Ausdoc was an office services business providing a range of solutions including document management and print, records management, courier, freight and warehousing services  and mailroom outsourcing.
The role required integration of multiple business cultures, processes and offers which was achieved over a two year period. The business was ultimately divested as a result of strategic misalignment at Board level.

jobs.location: Mayne Nickless ( Wards Skyroad / Maynes Express)
jobs.description:
Operated in a number of senior P&L roles thru this period with the most recent as
      General Manager of Wards Skyroad which at time was industry leader in express air
      
      freight services.

general.headline: VicTas Freight Express
general.description: Experienced Head Of Sales with a demonstrated history of working in the transportation/trucking/railroad industry. Skilled in Analytical Skills, Import, Freight, Ocean Transportation, and Strategic Sourcing. Strong business development professional graduated from St Josephs.

jobs.description:
VTFE is privately owned and operated by people who work in the business each and every day. Established in 2010 our motto, ‘Proudly Independent’ reflects 4 local guys taking on the Corporate Internationals and not only succeeding, but excelling.

How do we do that? Quite simply by being hands on, answering our phones each and every time and providing a service second to none. By ‘service’ we mean pickup and delivery of your freight in full and on time, POD's on line, friendly, knowledgeable customer service staff and a carrier that understands what transport customers require.

VTFE offers a friendly, professional and experienced local freight service provided by staff & drivers who care about your business.

Our People

The staff at VTFE has well over 100 years combined experience in local freight and all have worked for independent carriers previously. What this means to our customers is knowledge, experience and an uncompromising commitment to old fashion service & values.

The Difference

Too often you phone the large corporate freight company only to be placed on ’1800 HOLD’. Once you get off hold it’s a message machine or an operator looking to off load you to another voicemail.  At VTFE we understand how time critical your requirements are.

VTFE customers get to speak with real people that care about you, your freight and customer relationships.
Strategic Consulting, including logistics planning & transport strategy development.

New Business Role. Providing solutions for the National distribution of Manufactured,
      Retail and Wholesale products. Account Management is part of the role once prospect
      
      becomes a customer.

Managed the fit out of a purpose built 5 level Extra Services Nursing Home.
Purchasing associated with the day to day management of residents (Inventory Management).
Financial Planning and Budgeting, A/c's Payable and Receivable.
Management reporting.

general.headline: State Manager at DHL Supply Chain Vic & SA
general.description:
I am a professional Transport/State level Manager with over 20 years experience within the industry, my expertise ranges from developing positive ways to capture and improve transport utilization on various levels and optimize industry technology to manage major projects and risk analysis when dealing with customers and staff. 

My strengths include the ability to manage staff during periods of high volume, pressure and change, whilst encouraging team growth improving workplace culture and a huge focus on workplace safety. 

Generating management reports and problem solving tasks to encourage staff to think and create positive results to enhance continuous improvement and work alongside IT to continually look at better ways of improving business data from KPI reporting to cost recovery & asset analysis.  

Having and creating a satisfied customer portfolio is the key to any business, I have had the pleasure of working with some great transport companies over the years and dealing with many high profile customers that demand the best with very little tolerance, which has helped me develop my knowledge of customer expectations and relations.

general.description:

jobs.description:

Demand forecasting for local and imported lighting range and making sure we have right item available in inventory at the right time.

•	Successfully reduced operational costs by 60% by contracting a third-party operator for warehouse and logistics for all of our Fosani range. 95% inventory loss reduction was also achieved.
•	Within one year, improved efficiency of operations, resulting in increased customer confidence and approximately 30% in sales per month.

general.headline: National Sales Manager at Kings Transport
general.description:
"I love my work and the people that I engage with." Looking into the mirror I believe that I see an experienced and successful commercially focused Manager. Striving to improve always I have delivered in EGM and GM roles in Management, BD/Sales, IT and Operations. Bringing together the players to execute a winning plan is what I enjoy the most. Playing my part, at all levels is what I pride myself on. I like to think that I manage up and down as the task or people require. I form a part of winning teams and enjoy growth the most.

I am an experienced Growth specialist in National Business Development with a demonstrated history of working in the transportation/trucking/railroad industry. I am a strong operations professional skilled in Negotiation, Operations Management, Freight, Sales, and Ocean Transportation.

I wish you well and look forward to future projects.

jobs.description:
Since joining Kings in 1998 I have contributed in: Major Business Development, IT, Implementation & Integration, Safety Management and Operational Asset Procurement. 

Currently I work within the Group Business Development Team. Our focus is to position the Kings brand in the national contract Logistics space. 

In my role I share responsibility in aligning Kings core capabilities with major customers Transport and Logistics requirements. 

My approach is consultative and relies heavily on providing Proof Points with Evidentiary back up. An analytical approach is followed to identify gaps and provide solutions.

I look forward to enquires from any Vertical market and also enjoy the ability to seek and build strong partnerships.

The responsibility of providing focused customer operational solutions to Kings Major Partners, whilst leading a professional and innovative Team are both honours that I relish. My passions are Safety, Technology, Compliance, Productivity and Leadership. Our valued Customers and Staff are our family. We all share common goals, and I look forward to engaging with you now and into the future. Thank you All.

general.headline: Recruitment @ CureRecruitment
general.description:
I am an Recruitment specialist specialising in Legal and Logistics Recruitment Nationally. 

I work closely with clients who are both private and public to gain a clear understanding of their key services and market share. My goal is to provide each of my clients with a value-adding solution to their recruitment needs and present them with quality candidates that will fulfill the requirements of each role, as well as fit into the culture and environment of the company, to ensure a successful long term outcome. 

I pride myself on delivering an exceptional level of service and going above and beyond to assist my clients, highlighted with my previous placements. With my strong background in legal, logistics and public relations, I understand the importance of ensuring you have outstanding employees in your organisation.

jobs.description: During my time as the Chief Entertainment and Brand Manager I have successfully secured clients on a national and international level in both Brand Management and Celebrity/Entertainment Management. I have created new leads, endorsements and deals by implementing successful marketing and publicity campaigns as well as finding and creating new opportunities for clients in a variety of industries ranging from Sports to Entertainment and Brands. Clients include but are not limited to Katie Price, Sistar Shoes, Mia Rose, Arlene Zelina, Shengo Deane and many more.

jobs.companyName: B SERIES Group of Recruitment Consultancies "Better Quality Candidates, Faster"
jobs.description:
Our value proposition to you is to find “Better Quality Candidates, Faster”. 
Barclay Recruitment is part of the B Series Recruitment group. The B Series is a privately owned permanent and contracting executive recruitment group, specializing in Logistics, Resources, Manufacturing, Engineering and Construction. Founded in 2002, The B Series Group maintains one of the largest industry specific candidate databases called the “B Series Talent Bank”. This database holds over 180,000 candidates and puts our clients in reach of the best quality employees in the market. 
Servicing clients and candidates in the Logistics sector, specific service capabilities are:
•	Warehouse Team Leader/Supervisor
•	Logistics Supervisor
•	Transport Allocator/Supervisor
•	Inventory Controller/Manager
•	Warehouse Manager
•	Transport Manager
•	Operations Manager (Logistics)
•	DC Manager

•	National Operations Manager
•	General Manager 
•	Project Manager (Logistics)
•	Customs brokers
•	Biosecurity consultants
•	Tariff consultants
•	Heavy Logistics consultants
•	High calibre shipping and logistics relationship managers that have substantial experience in shipping heavy cargo via RoRo and break bulk vessels.

Empire is a Transport company servicing Melbourne and regional Victoria with courier, taxi truck and permanent fleet hire. Whether you need just one small box delivered across town, or a 10 truck fleet servicing all your customers, you will feel the difference with Empire Transport. 

Unlike many large and impersonal operations, Empire Transport is always customer focused. We are big enough to handle all your local transport needs – with personal service that always makes you feel like you’re our only customer. 

Empire Transport provides a range of transport solutions tailored to our customers’ requirements; couriers, taxi truck hire, permanent fleet hire, customer warehouse and driver integration.

If you want to get in touch, you can contact me via email at shyann@empiretransport.com.au

jobs.companyName: Higher Education division of John Wiley and Sons
jobs.description:
As a New Business Sales Consultant, I am responsible for promoting a full selection of textbook and technical solutions for all professors and educators in the Higher Education market within Victoria and Tasmania with the goal of improving students learning outcomes.

Founded in 1807, John Wiley & Sons (Wiley) has been a leading global publisher providing both print and digital content and services for worldwide academics with core focus on scientific, technical, medical, scholarly journals.  

Working in Higher Education, the entire team share the mission of helping teachers teach and students learn.

My role is to identify new business opportunities as well as cover a lucrative Victorian
      
      portfolio of clients.
